title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - | SIT Feedback Loop for Content explorer and DLP alerts
description: ,Now available in public preview, admins can provide feedback for sensitive information type (SIT) False Positives via Content explorer and DLP Alerts. This feedback can be provided in a compliant manner and users can see a summary view of the feedback in the SIT overview page. The feedback will be used to make systematic fixes to SITs for improved accuracy.
